attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Her Sovereign Majesty Queen Elizabeth II will resume monarchical duties over all states, commonwealths and other territories.
Tax collectors from Her Majesty's Government will be in America shortly after the independence is revoked to ensure the acquisition of all revenues due (backdated to 1776).

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
